name: Deanna Dong
description: Deanna Dong is a Product Manager on Wealthfront’s Growth Team. She is excited to help more people discover the value of automated investment services. Prior to Wealthfront, Deanna led the Marketing Operations team at Dropbox, which focused on both B2B demand generation and B2C growth efforts. Prior to Dropbox, she worked on the fixed income derivatives sales desk at Deutsche Bank covering insurance companies and money managers. She holds a AB in Economics from Harvard College.
